summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'DGMM', 'morphology-specific', 'single-ion', 'MSI' (bio.tools/msi) | Unsupervised segmentation of mass spectrometric ion images characterizes morphology of tissues | Spatial Dirichlet Gaussian Mixture Model for single ion images | run W_matrix.R GMM.R k_DGMM.R S_DGMM.R first | run CpG_Sal_mouse brain.R to get results of CpG and Sal preconditioned mouse brain data
summary.name: IonSpattern
